basicInfo.desc: This task sets the current elements of a RW Document Selector Control and serializes the results.

parameter.name: messageID
parameter.desc: The Message ID of a previously executed Report Writer Document.

parameter.name: selectorKeyContext
parameter.desc: The key context of the Selector Control. It may be a simple key for the control or a key with tree type and node type (all separated by ITEM_SEPARATOR). Multiple attribute will be separated by CONTROL_GROUP_BY_SEPARATOR (see EnumRWBeanEvents for details).

parameter.name: ctlKey
parameter.desc: The key of the Selector Control

parameter.name: elemList
parameter.desc: A list of element IDs separated by the ITEM_SEPARATOR (see EnumRWBeanEvents for details). Multiple attribute will be separated by CONTROL_GROUP_BY_SEPARATOR (see EnumRWBeanEvents for details).

parameter.name: include
parameter.desc: A flag indicate whether the elements selection is include or exclusive.
